roadmapItems.title: Release 1.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Initial release with model building interface and data preprocessing tools.

children.title: Model Building Interface
children.description: Introducing an interface for building machine learning models.

children.title: Resolved issues with algorithm selection dropdown.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting the selection of algorithms from dropdown.

children.title: Fixed bugs in training dataset upload.
children.description: Corrected errors encountered during the upload of training datasets.

children.title: Added support for drag-and-drop dataset upload.
children.description: Introduced drag-and-drop functionality for easier dataset uploads.

children.title: Introduced real-time progress tracking for model training.
children.description: Added features for tracking the progress of model training in real-time.

children.title: Data Preprocessing Tools
children.description: Providing tools for data preprocessing to prepare datasets for modeling.

children.title: Corrected errors in data normalization.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting the normalization of data.

children.title: Fixed issues with missing value imputation.
children.description: Resolved issues in the imputation of missing values in datasets.

children.title: Added automated feature scaling.
children.description: Introduced automated scaling of features to improve model performance.

children.title: Implemented support for categorical data encoding.
children.description: Added support for encoding categorical data to prepare it for modeling.

roadmapItems.title: Release 1.3.0
roadmapItems.description: Enhancing algorithm support and model evaluation metrics.

children.title: Algorithm Expansion
children.description: Adding new algorithms and improving algorithm performance.

children.title: Resolved issues with algorithm performance benchmarking.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting the benchmarking of algorithm performance.

children.title: Fixed bugs in hyperparameter tuning.
children.description: Resolved issues with tuning hyperparameters for algorithms.

children.title: Added support for ensemble methods.
children.description: Introduced support for ensemble methods to improve model performance.

children.title: Introduced new algorithms such as XGBoost and LightGBM.
children.description: Added new algorithms like XGBoost and LightGBM for more options.

children.title: Model Evaluation Metrics
children.description: Enhancing the evaluation metrics for model performance assessment.

children.title: Corrected discrepancies in accuracy calculation.
children.description: Fixed problems causing discrepancies in accuracy calculation.

children.title: Fixed bugs in confusion matrix display.
children.description: Resolved issues affecting the display of confusion matrices.

children.title: Added support for precision, recall, and F1-score metrics.
children.description: Introduced metrics like precision, recall, and F1-score for better evaluation.

children.title: Implemented ROC curve and AUC metrics.
children.description: Added ROC curve and AUC metrics for evaluating model performance.

roadmapItems.title: Release 2.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Major update with advanced data preprocessing, deployment options, and user collaboration.

children.title: Advanced Data Preprocessing
children.description: Enhancing data preprocessing tools for better model preparation.

children.title: Resolved issues with data splitting.
children.description: Fixed problems with splitting datasets into training and test sets.

children.title: Fixed errors in outlier detection.
children.description: Resolved issues in detecting outliers in datasets.

children.title: Introduced automated feature engineering.
children.description: Added automated feature engineering to simplify model building.

children.title: Added support for time series data preprocessing.
children.description: Introduced tools for preprocessing time series data.

children.title: Deployment Options
children.description: Introducing features for deploying models to various platforms.

children.title: Corrected issues with model deployment to cloud services.
children.description: Fixed problems with deploying models to cloud services.

children.title: Fixed bugs in REST API generation.
children.description: Resolved issues with generating REST APIs for models.

children.title: Added one-click deployment to AWS and Azure.
children.description: Introduced one-click deployment options for AWS and Azure.

children.title: Implemented support for containerized deployments using Docker.
children.description: Added support for deploying models in Docker containers.

children.title: User Collaboration
children.description: Enhancing collaboration features for multiple users.

children.title: Resolved issues with user permissions.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting user permissions for projects.

children.title: Fixed bugs in shared project access.
children.description: Resolved issues with accessing shared projects.

children.title: Introduced real-time collaboration on model building.
children.description: Added features for real-time collaboration on building models.

children.title: Added version control for models and datasets.
children.description: Introduced version control for managing models and datasets.

roadmapItems.title: Release 2.4.0
roadmapItems.description: Enhancements in model interpretability and performance optimization.

children.title: Model Interpretability
children.description: Introducing features to enhance the interpretability of models.

children.title: Corrected errors in feature importance calculation.
children.description: Fixed problems with calculating feature importance.

children.title: Fixed issues with SHAP values display.
children.description: Resolved issues affecting the display of SHAP values.

children.title: Added support for LIME (Local Interpretable Model-agnostic Explanations).
children.description: Introduced support for LIME to explain model predictions.

children.title: Introduced partial dependence plots for feature analysis.
children.description: Added partial dependence plots to analyze the impact of features.

children.title: Performance Optimization
children.description: Improving performance for faster and more efficient model training.

children.title: Resolved performance bottlenecks during model training.
children.description: Fixed issues causing performance bottlenecks in training models.

children.title: Fixed bugs in parallel processing.
children.description: Resolved issues with parallel processing during model training.

children.title: Improved training speed with hardware acceleration support.
children.description: Enhanced training speed by utilizing hardware acceleration.

children.title: Optimized memory usage for large datasets.
children.description: Improved memory usage to handle large datasets efficiently.

roadmapItems.title: Release 3.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Major update with automated machine learning, enhanced security, and integration with external tools.

children.title: Automated Machine Learning (AutoML)
children.description: Introducing automated machine learning for easier model building.

children.title: Resolved issues with automated hyperparameter tuning.
children.description: Fixed problems with automated tuning of hyperparameters.

children.title: Fixed errors in pipeline generation.
children.description: Resolved issues affecting the generation of AutoML pipelines.

children.title: Introduced AutoML for automatic model selection and tuning.
children.description: Added AutoML features for automatically selecting and tuning models.

children.title: Added support for custom AutoML pipelines.
children.description: Introduced support for creating custom AutoML pipelines.

children.title: Enhanced Security
children.description: Improving security features for better data protection.

children.title: Corrected vulnerabilities in user authentication.
children.description: Fixed security vulnerabilities in user authentication processes.

children.title: Fixed issues with data encryption.
children.description: Resolved problems with encrypting data.

children.title: Implemented role-based access control (RBAC).
children.description: Introduced role-based access control to enhance security.

children.title: Added support for multi-factor authentication.
children.description: Introduced multi-factor authentication for added security.

children.title: Integration with External Tools
children.description: Enhancing integration with external tools for better workflow.

children.title: Resolved issues with third-party tool integration.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting the integration with third-party tools.

children.title: Fixed bugs in data import from external sources.
children.description: Resolved issues with importing data from external sources.

children.title: Added integration with Jupyter Notebooks.
children.description: Introduced support for integrating with Jupyter Notebooks.

children.title: Implemented support for exporting models to ONNX and PMML formats.
children.description: Added support for exporting models to ONNX and PMML formats.

roadmapItems.title: Release 3.3.0
roadmapItems.description: Focused on advanced visualization tools and scalability enhancements.

children.title: Advanced Visualization Tools
children.description: Introducing advanced tools for data visualization.

children.title: Corrected errors in plot rendering.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting the rendering of plots.

children.title: Fixed bugs in interactive charts.
children.description: Resolved issues with interactive chart functionality.

children.title: Introduced advanced data visualization libraries.
children.description: Added support for advanced libraries to improve data visualization.

children.title: Added support for interactive dashboards.
children.description: Introduced interactive dashboards for better data analysis.

children.title: Scalability Enhancements
children.description: Improving scalability to support large-scale model training.

children.title: Resolved issues with horizontal scaling.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting the horizontal scaling of the application.

children.title: Fixed bugs in distributed training.
children.description: Resolved issues with training models in a distributed environment.

children.title: Improved support for large-scale model training.
children.description: Enhanced features to support training large-scale models efficiently.

children.title: Added auto-scaling for cloud deployments.
children.description: Introduced auto-scaling to handle varying loads in cloud deployments.
